title: Performance 'Portrait from the Past'
description: As part of Museum Night 2016, in collaboration with the 'Raznochinny Petersburg' museum, a performance was held during which a person could receive an instant digital version of a portrait taken on a retro camera due to a radical modification of its design.
materials: historical objects, Zenit camera, electronic components

title: BlinkUs
description: An interactive device that tracks a person's blinking and allows influencing the virtual reality environment. Created as part of Junction 2016.
status: At the Olimp Laboratory Museum in St. Petersburg

title: The First Dress in the CIS Printed on a 3D Printer
description: An original design of modular fabric, exhibited for the first time at Geek-Picnic 2017.

title: Snow Maiden 3000
description: A conceptual costume of the Snow Maiden, created in collaboration with the Costume Design Department of the A.L. Stiglitz Academy of Arts.

title: The Honor of the Uniform
description: Accessories for the uniform of a postman and postal official of imperial Russia for the 'postal carriage' installation, replicated from 1903 originals using 3D scanning.
status: At the Railway History Museum in St. Petersburg

title: unWatch
description: Smartwatch with gas-discharge indicators in a retro-futuristic style.
materials: PLA plastic, gas-discharge indicators, undocumented functionality

title: Digital Enigma of Maya
description: A mysterious chest that reveals its secrets only to the clairvoyant. An interactive sculpture.

title: Performance 'Relaxed Talks about Voltage'
description: I talk about high voltages, while calmly controlling high-voltage installations. Geek-Picnic 2018.

title: Bicycle Concept
description: With this concept, you won't get very far.

title: Cyberpunk Trash Sign
description: A sign inspired by Cyberpunk2077 for a trash container. It was indeed 3D-printed and placed on the authors trash basket. It represents what we already live in cyberpunk, but it is not what we expected.

title: Performance 'Cybernetic Cabaret'
description: A small performance addressing the dangers that may arise from irresponsible handling of modern technologies.

title: Trace in the Steppe
description: An engraving on glass reflecting the indelible mark of human presence in the boundless steppe.

title: Sip in the Steppe
description: An installation featuring a glass filled with water, symbolizing the fleeting nature and the vital moment of existence.

title: Sigh in the Steppe
description: A conceptual installation where emptiness is enlivened by media projection, conveying invisible energy and profound meaning.
